  • Methodendetails

    • save

      public void save(File file, Map<String,Object> data) throws IOException
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: ConfigFileHandler

      Saves configuration data to a file without comments.

      
 Map<String, Object> config = Map.of(
     "server.port", 8080,
     "database.url", "jdbc:mysql://localhost/db"
 );
 handler.save(new File("config.yml"), config);
      Angegeben von:
      save in Schnittstelle ConfigFileHandler
      Parameter:
      file - the target file to save to
      data - the configuration data to save
      Löst aus:
      IOException - if file operations fail

    • save

      public void save(File file, Map<String,Object> data, Map<String,String> comments) throws IOException
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: ConfigFileHandler

      Saves configuration data to a file with comments for supported formats.

      
 Map<String, Object> config = Map.of("server.port", 8080);
 Map<String, String> comments = Map.of("server.port", "Web server port");
 handler.save(new File("config.yml"), config, comments);
      Angegeben von:
      save in Schnittstelle ConfigFileHandler
      Parameter:
      file - the target file to save to
      data - the configuration data to save
      comments - the comments to include with the data
      Löst aus:
      IOException - if file operations fail

    • load

      public Map<String,Object> load(File file) throws IOException
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: ConfigFileHandler

      Loads configuration data from a file.

      
 Map<String, Object> config = handler.load(new File("config.yml"));
 Integer port = (Integer) config.get("server.port");
      Angegeben von:
      load in Schnittstelle ConfigFileHandler
      Parameter:
      file - the source file to load from
      Gibt zurück:
      the loaded configuration data
      Löst aus:
      IOException - if file operations fail

    • loadComments

      public Map<String,String> loadComments(File file) throws IOException
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: ConfigFileHandler

      Loads comments from a file for formats that support comment preservation.

      
 Map<String, String> comments = handler.loadComments(new File("config.yml"));
 String portComment = comments.get("server.port");
      Angegeben von:
      loadComments in Schnittstelle ConfigFileHandler
      Parameter:
      file - the source file to load comments from
      Gibt zurück:
      map of configuration paths to their comments
      Löst aus:
      IOException - if file operations fail

    • supportsComments

      public abstract boolean supportsComments()
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: ConfigFileHandler

      Indicates whether this handler supports comment preservation.

      
 if (handler.supportsComments()) {
     Map<String, String> comments = handler.loadComments(file);
 }
      Angegeben von:
      supportsComments in Schnittstelle ConfigFileHandler
      Gibt zurück:
      true if comments are supported, false otherwise

    • canHandle

      public boolean canHandle(File file)
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: ConfigFileHandler

      Determines if this handler can process the given file based on its extension and format.

      
 if (yamlHandler.canHandle(new File("config.yml"))) {
     Map<String, Object> data = yamlHandler.load(file);
 }
      Angegeben von:
      canHandle in Schnittstelle ConfigFileHandler
      Parameter:
      file - the file to check compatibility with
      Gibt zurück:
      true if this handler can process the file, false otherwise

    • getFileExtension

      public String getFileExtension()
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: ConfigFileHandler

      Gets the file extension pattern that this handler supports.

      
 String pattern = handler.getFileExtension();
 // For YAML handler: ".*\.(yml|yaml)$"
      Angegeben von:
      getFileExtension in Schnittstelle ConfigFileHandler
      Gibt zurück:
      the regex pattern for supported file extensions

    • wasCalled

      public boolean wasCalled()
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: ConfigFileHandler

      Indicates whether this handler has been used to load or save a file.

      
 if (handler.wasCalled()) {
     // Handler was used
 }
      Angegeben von:
      wasCalled in Schnittstelle ConfigFileHandler
      Gibt zurück:
      true if load or save was called, false otherwise
